practice_phrases: Find it.
找到。
I can find it.
我能找到。
I can't find it.
我找不到。
Could you find that?
你能找到吗？
I know I can find it.
我知道我能找到。
I can find different words.
我能找到不同的词。
I'm sure you can find what you need.
我确定你能找到你需要的。
I can find enough different words when I take time.
当我花时间的时候我能找到足够多不同的词。
I don't know if I can find what I wanted to say yet.
我还不知道我能不能找到我想说的话。
Are you sure you can help me find what I need?
你确定你能帮我找到我需要的吗？
Find the answer.
找到答案。
I can find the answer.
我能找到答案。
Could you find the answer?
你能找到答案吗？
I can't find the answer.
我找不到答案。
I know how to find the answer.
我知道怎么找到答案。
It's not easy to find the answer.
找到答案不容易。
I'm not sure if I can find the answer yet.
我还不确定我能不能找到答案。
Are you sure you can help me find the answer?
你确定你能帮我找到答案吗？
When you understand enough words, you can find the answer.
当你理解足够多的词的时候，你能找到答案。
I know it's not difficult to find the answer if you take time to test yourself.
我知道如果你花时间测试自己，找到答案不难。
It's difficult.
很难。
That's difficult.
那很难。
Learning Chinese is difficult.
学中文很难。
Finding the answer is difficult.
找到答案很难。
I know it's difficult to find the answer.
我知道找到答案很难。
Finding what you need is difficult.
找到你需要的很难。
I'm sure learning enough different words is difficult.
我确定学足够多不同的词很难。
It's difficult to remember how to say what you want.
记住怎么说你想说的很难。
I don't know if it's difficult to find the answer when you take time.
我不知道当你花时间的时候找到答案难不难。
Are you sure it's difficult to find enough words to say what you wanted to say?
你确定找到足够多的词来说你想说的话很难吗？
It's not difficult.
不难。
That's not difficult.
那不难。
Learning Chinese is not difficult.
学中文不难。
This test is not difficult.
这个测试不难。
I know it's not difficult to find the answer.
我知道找到答案不难。
Finding what you need is not difficult.
找到你需要的不难。
I know how to say enough words so it's not difficult.
我知道怎么说足够多的词，所以不难。
When you understand enough words, it's not difficult to find the answer.
当你理解足够多的词的时候，找到答案不难。
I'm sure learning Chinese is not difficult if you take time to test yourself.
我确定如果你花时间测试自己，学中文不难。
Finding different words to say what you want is not difficult when you know enough.
当你知道足够多的时候，找到不同的词来说你想说的不难。
It's not difficult at all.
并不难。
That's not difficult at all.
那并不难。
Finding the answer is not difficult at all.
找到答案并不难。
Learning Chinese is not difficult at all.
学中文并不难。
I know it's not difficult at all to find what you need.
我知道找到你需要的并不难。
Testing yourself is not difficult at all when you take time.
当你花时间的时候测试自己并不难。
I'm sure learning enough different words is not difficult at all.
我确定学足够多不同的词并不难。
When you understand what I say, finding the answer is not difficult at all.
当你理解我说的时候，找到答案并不难。
I know how to remember different words so learning Chinese is not difficult at all.
我知道怎么记住不同的词，所以学中文并不难。
Are you sure it's not difficult at all to find enough words to say what you want?
你确定找到足够多的词来说你想说的并不难吗？
